snippet.title: 9 Innings: Pro Baseball 2011 - Official Trailer [HD]
snippet.description:
This is the REAL baseball game you have been waiting for. 

Coming on July, for baseball fans, with the All-Star event!

The long-awaited 2010 All-Star Game will begin in 15 days! 
In addition, a real baseball game featured with around 800 real all-stars will be coming to make your time worth to play on iPhone/iPod Touch. Com2uS, the developer of Homerun Battle 3D that intoxicated baseball game fans will be launching a real, fully featured baseball game with MLBPA license that you can play with real baseball players' names and play records. Are you ready for this summer excitement, '9 Innings: Pro Baseball 2011'? 
Full-featured REAL Baseball Game

- Compete in 3 Different Modes of Play: Season, Exhibition, and Homerun Derby

Enjoy fully interactive game play when Pitching, Batting, and Fielding
Experience an entire Major League Baseball Seasons from A to Z

- Acquired official license from MLBPA

Access 780+ actual Major League player profiles
You can play with Real MLB Players' names, pictures and data.

- Card System

Collect your favorite player cards, upgrade them and manage your team
Change lineups, rotations, and players as Team Manager

- 100 missions to accomplish
